name: Yian Kut-Ku Training
quest-details: The key to using a Sword is speed. Use your speed to get into the absolute best position possible!

name: Yian Kut-Ku Training
quest-details: Time to learn the Great Sword. Evade more than you Guard and attack until the chance comes for a charged blow!

name: Yian Kut-Ku Training
quest-details: It's Hammer time! Here is my new rap. "That monster ain't a star! I hit it on the head and it's seein' stars!

name: Yian Kut-Ku Training
quest-details: As Lance users say, Guarding is life. Don't forget that! Guard against attacks, create an opening, then counter!

name: Yian Kut-Ku Training
quest-details: The Light Bowgun has a new feature and it's called "Rapid Fire"! Learn it, live it, love it!

name: Congalala Training
quest-details: Now it's time for the Dual Blades! But beware of smelly attacks! If you get hosed, make sure to use Deodorant!

name: Congalala Training
quest-details: Nimbly return the beast's attacks, make an opening and then unleash the Spirit Blade! That's the way of the Long Sword.

name: Congalala Training
quest-details: You're still a bit of a rookie, so let me tell you a great comb. White-White-Red-Yellow, then you strike!

name: Congalala Training
quest-details: Say hello to a Lance with real firepower, the Gunlance! From thrusts to Shelling, combine attacks to victory!

name: Congalala Training
quest-details: Bow training has begun! You can use a charge attack even with a coating! Keep your distance for maximum power!

name: Khezu Training
quest-details: This time I've prepared a Sword that literally spits flames! It should lead to an easy victory, so show off your skills!

name: Khezu Training
quest-details: The weapon you have is tremendously powerful, but has terrible Sharpness. So charge it up and aim for the head!

name: Khezu Training
quest-details: Using a Hunting Horn means using Self-Improvement! If you can't, you're finished! Just link White to White.

name: Khezu Training
quest-details: When you see a Khezu's electricity wane, that's your chance! Use Wyvern's Fire and blow it away! Great, huh?

name: Khezu Training
quest-details: I've attached a Shield to your Heavy Bowgun. With this, you'll have a perfect Guard. You're allowed to be pleased.

name: Daimyo Hermitaur Training
quest-details: You can't break a Daimyo's shell with this weapon! Thus, aim for its claw. Attack it with a truly Devilish Dance!

name: Daimyo Hermitaur Training
quest-details: The fast-moving Daimyo can only be stopped by breaking its legs! Strike as hard as you can and knock it down!

name: Daimyo Hermitaur Training
quest-details: Break down the skull on the Daimyo's back with the shocking attacks of the Hunting Horn! Attack with gusto!

name: Daimyo Hermitaur Training
quest-details: Showdown time! With the high Guard ability of this equipment, you can never be defeated! Show your true power!

name: Daimyo Hermitaur Training
quest-details: Stopping a Daimyo's guard will require a Sonic Bomb. Then attack and you will see its pain! Just be careful.

name: Blangonga Training
quest-details: Today, I have prepared a Sword with paralysis effect. Use it to stop the beast's movement and hit it with a Barrel Bomb.

name: Blangonga Training
quest-details: Fire is the natural enemy of a Blangonga. The weapon I've given you should break its fangs right off... Try it!

name: Blangonga Training
quest-details: Theory has it a head blow from a Hammer will stun, but the Blangonga's head is tough to strike! So hit it when it's down!

name: Blangonga Training
quest-details: Enemies who move quickly have a huge advantage over users of heavy Lances. Shift strategies and use a trap or two!

name: Blangonga Training
quest-details: Those silly enough to attack head-on usually end up as dinner! Find an opening, then strike again and again!

name: Yian Garuga Training
quest-details: Dual Blades and Power Juice! The perfect combo! Gulp it down and Demonize! It's the winning way!

name: Yian Garuga Training
quest-details: No time to wait around for the perfect attack? Then hit and run by using quick and nimble draw attacks!

name: Yian Garuga Training
quest-details: Enter a dangerous foe! If you don't avoid its roar, the attack after will be your doom! Use traps wisely!

name: Yian Garuga Training
quest-details: Your enemy may be quick, but you can handle it if you pay attention! Guard and step your way to victory!

name: Yian Garuga Training
quest-details: Turnabout Time! I've prepared armor to change the tide of battle! Show me your true worth! Dive into the fray!

name: Tigrex Training
quest-details: The short range of a Sword means it is only suited for melee combat. Focus on an enemy's movements and boldy strike out!

name: Tigrex Training
quest-details: A blind rush forward will result in unimaginable pain. Avoid the front, and move to attack from the sides!

name: Tigrex Training
quest-details: White-White-Red-Green-Red! The key to victory! If you can't do that, White-White-Red or even just White-White is OK!

name: Tigrex Training
quest-details: Being able to Guard against attacks is the strong suit of this melee weapon! Pain is failure! Calmly fight to victory!

name: Tigrex Training
quest-details: An angered Tigrex is incredibly speedy! If you plan to escape with your weapon readied, it's already too late!

name: Diablos Training
quest-details: Listen! I've prepared armor with Hearing Protection! A tremendous skill! Slice away... There's nothing to fear!

name: Diablos Training
quest-details: When facing a Diablos with a Great Sword, using Guard is key! Become a master of the Instant Guard!

name: Diablos Training
quest-details: Life and death decisions happen instantly with a Hammer. You can't escape a roar, so use wisdom to stay alive!

name: Diablos Training
quest-details: I've prepared equipment to increase your strength! Use your Shelling and slicing to force the tyrant to surrender!

name: Diablos Training
quest-details: Against Diablos, the shells you have won't cut it. Look for chances in the fight to combine new ammo!

name: Gravios Training
quest-details: Did you know the first attack on a sleeping foe is quite powerful? Barrel Bombs drive this point home. Use them effectively!

name: Gravios Training
quest-details: To get to a Gravios, first you have to do something about that terrible tail! Find a chance and aim to cut it off!

name: Gravios Training
quest-details: With your equipment, white gas will have no effect! Huh? What about red gas? That's for you to handle!

name: Gravios Training
quest-details: A normal attack will just find you on the receiving end of its counter! Put up a fortress-like Guard and Shell!

name: Gravios Training
quest-details: Using a Shield to defend against heat is unwise, but your foe can't move during heat attacks! That's your cue to attack!

name: Kirin Training
quest-details: If a Kirin's neck begins to shine, be careful! You can't touch an angry Kirin, so devote yourself to an escape!

name: Kirin Training
quest-details: If you don't have Spirit charged, you attack won't penetrate. Aim for its weak horn, and attack with your full spirit!

name: Kirin Training
quest-details: I've prepared equipment that increases power in a pinch! It's up to you, steady battle or all-out assault!

name: Kirin Training
quest-details: Staving off Thunder with Guard is an impossible task. Step nimbly to avoid the areas where Thunder falls.

name: Kirin Training
quest-details: How you go about hitting the small target of a Kirin is incredibly important. Firing wildly means you many run out of shells!
